channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: ‘SNL’: Watch Doja Cat Perform ‘Gorgeous,’ ‘Aaahh Men!’
item.description: 🌟 Get ready to groove with Doja Cat on SNL! 🎶💃 #DojaCat #SNL #MusicNews

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter and Shania Twain Perform “That Don’t Impress Me Much” at ACL: Watch
item.description: 🎶✨ Sabrina Carpenter and Shania Twain rock out to "That Don't Impress Me Much" at ACL! 🎤🤠 #MusicMagic #GirlPower

item.title: Kristi Noem on NFL’s Decision to Book Bad Bunny: “They Suck, and We’ll Win”
item.description: 🎶 Bad Bunny bringing the heat to NFL! 🔥 Kristi Noem not a fan, but music always prevails! 🏈🐰 #MusicNews #BadBunny #NFL

item.title: Taylor Swift’s The Life of a Showgirl Sells 2.7 Million Copies in First 24 Hours
item.description: 🌟 Taylor Swift slays with 2.7M copies sold in 24 hours! Who else is jamming to The Life of a Showgirl? 🎶💃 #SwiftiesUnite

item.title: Watch Moonchild Sanelly and Nadine Shah join Self Esteem on stage in Bristol
item.description: Get ready to feel the vibes with Moonchild Sanelly and Nadine Shah joining Self Esteem in Bristol! 🎶🔥 #MusicMagic
